doc.title: Erotic Centerfolds, Vol. 2
doc.plot: Follow five amazingly hot, centerfold-quality guys as they strip and pose just for you. Go home with all American man Breck and watch as he sprawls on his bed in the nude and then lathers up his hot body in the shower. Meanwhile, young, slim stud Michael roller blades down the beach side to a private area next to the sea where he strips to show you his impressive assets. Next, tattooed Playgirl centerfold Noah shows his remarkable, chiseled body in the shower while running his hands over his smooth muscles. Clean-cut, blonde athlete Andrew takes you from the beach to the studio where he strips his clothes off and flaunts his impressive muscled body. Finally, join long haired hunk Pete for a jog and then go back home with him as he takes his sweaty clothes off and poses for you showing his sexy, toned body. - This video contains full frontal nudity.
